si.title: ෆොන්සේකා පැමිණියේ බෝම්බ ප්රහාරයක් සමඟ මෝටර් රථයක් සමඟ ය
body_lines: මේ වසරේ පැවති ජනාධිපතිවරණයේදී සරත් ෆොන්සේකා ලෑන්ඩ්ඩර් සංකේතවේදී ස්වාධීන අපේක්ෂකයෙකු ලෙසත්, ඇගේ පළමු මැතිවරණ රැලිය ඉරිදා (18) පැවැත්විණි.
ඔහු බෝම්බ මෝටර් රථය ඔහුගේ රැලියට ගෙන ආ බව සැලකිය යුතුය.

en.title: Fonseka came with a bomb hit car
body_lines: Sarath Fonseka is contesting as an independent candidate at the Lander symbol in this year's presidential election and her first election rally was held on Sunday (18).
It is noteworthy that he also brought the bomb car to his rally.

summary_lines: Sarath Fonseka, running as an independent candidate in Sri Lanka's presidential election, made headlines by bringing a car damaged by a bomb to his inaugural rally. This symbolic gesture underscores his resilience and determination amidst adversity.
